reviews.text: My family and I stayed here for 1 week in August 2008. we hired a car and used the directions on the hotel website to find our way.
reviews.title: Loved it but difficult to locate

reviews.text: The directions were very inaccurate and it took almost 5 hours to find the hotel despite phoning them 4 times ( journey should take 25 mins). We got talking to lots of guests after we arrived who reported similiar experiences.
reviews.title: Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I notice that the directions on the hotel website have now been changed.
reviews.title: very quiet el marques resort
View from the Radisson
reviews.text: Anyway our stay was very pleasant. The hotel is beautiful. We had a 2 bedroom suite with large balcony, kitchen and 2 bathrooms. After a few days I noticed a strange smell in the room that the maintenence man thought might be from the air conditioning.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were moved to another 2 bedroom suite that was about 3 times the size of the original with a wrap around balcony and also a terrace off one of the bedrooms.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

likes.liked: — All very clean, modern and staff very very friendly and helpful
likes.disliked: — It looked like something had leaked into the ceiling of our bathroom and had not been repaired but really didn't bother us too much
